CalendarMaker

Class MakeCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • CalendarMaker.MakeCalendar

  • public class MakeCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
    This contains all calender entry objects and provieds methods to convert these objects (e.c. into csv- or .ics - files).
    Author:
    Berthold

    • Constructor Detail

      • MakeCalendar

        public MakeCalendar(java.lang.String path)
        Reads the source file containing the calendar entry's and extracts them by parsing line by line and creates a new entry for this calendar.

        If a line contains at least a date, it is marked as a valid entry. if not, it is marked as invalid.
